abstract: Stewart-Haas Racing is leaving Chevrolet for Ford.

keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: In a bid to strengthen its Nascar roster, Ford pulled off a surprising coup by taking Stewart-Haas Racing away from Chevrolet.
lead_paragraph: In a bid to strengthen its Nascar roster, Ford pulled off a surprising coup by taking Stewart-Haas Racing away from Chevrolet.
